theme: जीव ब्रह्म में बहुत भेद है
meaning: भेदव्यपदेशात्॥भेदव्यपदेशात् (Bheda Vyapadeshat) signifies the meaning of this verse in Sanskrit. भेदव्यपदेशात् is a compound word composed of two terms:1. भेद (bheda) meaning "difference" or "distinction".2. व्यपदेश (vyapadesha) meaning "designation" or "indication".So, the literal meaning of भेदव्यपदेशात् is "by the indication of difference".In the context of Brahma Sutras, this verse is referring to the necessity of understanding and indicating the differences between various philosophies and viewpoints in order to attain a comprehensive and accurate interpretation of the ultimate truth or Brahman. It emphasizes the importance of considering the different views and approaches to address the intricacies of metaphysical and philosophical concepts. The verse implies that a complete understanding of the absolute reality can be obtained only by analyzing and reflecting upon the various aspects and perspectives presented in different philosophies.
